idle.description: Idle or resting state of primary accent color
Idle or resting state of default action color

emphasis.description:
This Token can be used for foreground elements on white bgs

Use a warning alert to help a user avoid an issue. If the user can take an immediate action to avoid the issue, provide a way to do that.

regular.description:
This Token should not be used for text or important graphic elements. It can be used as a support accent color (borders), but use should be restricted to decorative purposes.

Use a warning alert to help a user avoid an issue. If the user can take an immediate action to avoid the issue, provide a way to do that.

subdued.description:
This Token should not be used for text or important graphic elements. It can be used as a support accent color (borders), but use should be restricted to decorative purposes.

Use a warning alert to help a user avoid an issue. If the user can take an immediate action to avoid the issue, provide a way to do that.

surface.description:
This Token should not be used for text or important graphic elements. It can be used as a surface/bg color in combination with neutral emphasis.

Use a warning alert to help a user avoid an issue. If the user can take an immediate action to avoid the issue, provide a way to do that.

emphasis.description: Use an urgent alert color to help a user understand a critical issue at the system level.

regular.description: Use an urgent alert color to help a user understand a critical issue at the system level.

subdued.description: Use an urgent alert color to help a user understand a critical issue at the system level.

surface.description: Use an urgent alert color to help a user understand a critical issue at the system level.
